snippet: A N.C.A.A. report shows that a record number of athletes are staying in college and that money continues to play a key role in classroom performance.
abstract: NCAA's latest Academic Progress Rate figures show record number of athletes are staying in college, and that better-endowed schools have easier time keeping them enrolled.
lead_paragraph: A N.C.A.A. report shows that a record number of athletes are staying in college and that money continues to play a key role in classroom performance.

headline.main: In N.C.A.A., Money Matters for Students’ Academic Progress
